job.title: Electrical Test Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Maxar is currently seeking an Electrical Test Engineer to join our Assembly Integration and Test department in Palo Alto CA In this role you will be responsible for all electrical testing of a given spacecraft from Communication Panel and Bus Module Integration through Launch Base activities This includes test planning development data analysis and initial troubleshooting efforts as requiredltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAnalyze and evaluate electrical circuits and interfaces using engineering knowledgeltbrgtltbrgtLead an electrical test team for 3 shift 7 days a week operationsltbrgtltbrgtPerform long term planning future test phases and new program developmentltbrgtltbrgtCollaborate with Spacecraft Manager Mechanical Vehicle Engineer and Communication Vehicle EngineerltbrgtltbrgtSupport any shift required during the course of the spacecraft build processltbrgtltbrgtTravel offsite for certain test phases and launch base supportltbrgtltbrgtCommunicate with peers using proper verbal and written skillsltbrgtltbrgtWrite review andor consult on electrical test proceduresltbrgtltbrgtUse electrical testing equipment oscilloscopes multimeters power supplies ectltbrgtltbrgtDocument all nonconformances and test anomalies following Assembly Integration and Test AIT policiesltbrgtltbrgtTroubleshoot test scriptsltbrgtltbrgtEnsure testing is in compliance with the test requirements document TRDltbrgtltbrgtUse Omega 3 data handling architecture and electrical power subsystem EPS architectureltbrgtltbrgtLead complex electrical spacecraft level troubleshooting efforts with support of systems engineeringltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMinimum RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtMust be a US citizen or permanent residentltbrgtltbrgtBachelors degree in engineering or a related field Four years of additional experience may be substituted for a degreeltbrgtltbrgt2 years of relevant experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggt5 years of relevant experienceltbrgtltbrgtFamiliarity with satellite wirelistsltbrgtltbrgtProgram management experienceltbrgtltbrgtHighly skilled with Microsoft OfficeltbrgtltbrgtStrong collaboration and communication skills
